name: Magic Chess Online
description:
Are you a professional chess player, an occasional player or a beginner? Don't wait any longer and join the most complete online chess video game ever created.

Magic Chess Online (MCO) modernizes this millennial game by bringing it into the new era of eSports.



Immerse yourself in the world of MCO and makes the history of chess.

- Tutorials to learn the basic rules
- Possibility to change the view during the game (2D or 3D animated)
- 3 classic levels of AI (Beginner, Intermediate, Expert)
- Face the real AI of MCO in Machine Learning !



- Compete against other classified players in Blitz or Classic mode
- Upgrade your ELO to unlock 11 ranks and become a World Championship Contender
- ELO, national and international ranking available
- Qualify for the World Championship of MCO every year and join the final show to pocket the jackpot !



- Challenge yourself by solving tens of thousands of puzzles as quickly as possible.
- Add your friends and compete against them in fully customizable games
- Replay and watch any game with a spectator mode and a powerful replay engine



- Animated chess boards and stunning environments
- Complete achievements and quests
- Continue your progress on your mobile thanks to a multiplatform online mode !



- Do you like this game and do you want to participate by increasing its influence? We will reward you with an in-app influence program !
- Relax by playing the different fun modes available for a limited time, but they will certainly come back !
- Create or join tournaments created by the community thanks to the most complete in-app tournament manager !



- Perfect your game with lessons created by experienced players directly in the app and become an "instructor" too !
- Play with your community and make your stream more interesting thanks to the features that we added specially for streamers!
- The physical or the virtual ? Regardless, you can play all of your games on connected chessboards if you want, and the pieces move by themselves, it's MAGIC !
- Tired of using your hands? Use your voice to move the pieces with the built-in voice control system!
- Immerse yourself in the various environments thanks to the Oculus Rift or the HTC Vive, we added the management of their controller!
